id.description: Index of the subEvent to update on the parent event. `0` for the first subEvent, `1` for the second event, and so on.

startDate.description: The date & time that the subEvent starts.

endDate.description: The date & time that the subEvent ends.

status.description: Indicates if the subEvent is still happening as scheduled or not.

type.description:
Required if `status` is included.
One of three possible status types.

- `Available`: The subEvent is happening as scheduled
- `TemporarilyUnavailable`: The subEvent will be postponed
- `Unavailable`: The subEvent is permanently cancelled

reason.description: The reason of the status on the event, as a localized human-readable text.

bookingAvailability.description: Indicates if the subEvent still has tickets or places available for booking.

type.description:
Required if `bookingAvailability` is included.
One of two possible status types.

- `Available`: The subEvent still has tickets or places available.
- `Unavailable`: The subEvent has no more tickets or places available.
